attributes.action: Community Action Groups should effectively be consulted in Planning Developments
attributes.background: As a Community Action Group (What Watton Wants) feels totally powerless and as any local community we all have to live with the consequences of Developers/Land Speculators applications.  As this affects the whole of the Country we really need everyone's support to make a difference.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning consultations are the responsibility of your local council.

You coudl start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law, so that local councils and/or developers are legally required to consult community action groups as part of the planning process.
